{"id":1085235806,"question_id":3165,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1698396265,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1085235806/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Indices With Index and Value Difference I","memory":"43.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] findIndices(int[] nums, int indexDifference, int valueDifference) {\n\n        for (int i=0; i<nums.length - indexDifference; i++){\n\n            for (int j=i+indexDifference; j<nums.length; j++){\n                \n                int absDiff = nums[i] > nums[j] ? nums[i] - nums[j] : nums[j] - nums[i];\n                \n                if (absDiff >= valueDifference){\n                    return new int[]{i,j};\n                }\n\n            }\n\n        }\n\n        return new int[]{-1,-1};\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-indices-with-index-and-value-difference-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
